alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Mower and Fillmore Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 858 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grand Meadow, or 17 miles south of Rochester, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Chatfield around 920 PM CDT. Preston and Fountain around 925 PM CDT. Lanesboro around 935 PM CDT. Rushford around 950 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Choice, Carimona, Old Barn Campground, Isinours, Fillmore, Peterson, Washington, Arendahl and Bratsberg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
